statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date, location FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware Attack';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, attacker_ip FROM security_incidents WHERE victim_ip = '192.168.1.10';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, description, location, attacker_ip, victim_ip FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM security_incidents WHERE attacker_ip = '192.168.1.1'
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY incident_type ASC
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE victim_ip = '10.0.0.1' OR victim_ip = '10.0.0.2'
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%ransomware%' OR description LIKE '%phishing%' ORDER BY incident_id ASC
SELECT * FROM security_incidents
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach'
SELECT attack_type, attack_date FROM cyber_attacks WHERE attack_vector = 'Phishing' ORDER BY attack_date ASC
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS incident_count FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_type
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware';
SELECT attack_vector, attack_type FROM cyber_attacks WHERE attack_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%ransomware%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_datetime, location FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM cyber_attacks WHERE attack_type = 'Phishing' AND success = TRUE;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, classification FROM incident_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_datetime DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT attack_type, target_system FROM cyber_attacks WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT pattern_description, detection_method, classification FROM incident_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE location = 'Office Building' AND severity >= 3;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, date_occurred, description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, attack_type, attack_vector, severity FROM cyber_attack_patterns WHERE severity > 7;
SELECT attacker_id, attacker_name, location FROM attacker_profiles WHERE location LIKE '%Europe%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, date_occurred FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type='Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM incident_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT attacker_name, attack_history FROM attacker_profiles WHERE location='United States' AND attack_history LIKE '%vulnerability%';
SELECT * FROM cyber_attack_patterns WHERE severity > 7 ORDER BY attack_type;
SELECT incident_id, date_occurred, description FROM security_incidents WHERE date_occurred >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_occurred ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attack_patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT attacker_name, attacker_country FROM attackers WHERE attack_method = 'DDoS';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM affected_assets WHERE asset_type IS NOT NULL AND asset_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attack_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT attacker_name, attacker_country FROM attackers WHERE attacker_country = 'Russia';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM affected_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Database' LIMIT 5;
